entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
